content: > **please note ** this pattern is free to view in its entirety on my blog 2 > this ad-free downloadable pdf enables > me to be able to bring you more free > patterns in the future go to the free pattern here 3 **description ** baskets are one of the easiest ways to add personality to a room they can be any color or colors texture and hold fun little odds and ends making them great for treasure hunts and when you can crochet one well you ve got nothing but a world of possibilities at your hands and with the trudy two-tone basket you ve got an easy bottom-up basket design that s super approachable and lets you pick the colors that will best match your space this basket features easy to make texture using stitches you probably already know and is a fun quick make best part of any basket it will look gorgeous holding your next wip or wips the sample for this basket was made with hue + me by lion brand yarn 4 affiliate link you can get a kit for this pattern on lion brand s website here 5 affiliate link you may sell all finished products made from this pattern however you may not share sell or distribute this pattern in any way in whole or in part i would greatly appreciate a link back to my shop or this pattern anytime you sell this item online gauge listed in pattern written in us crochet terms you may not use any of the photos from this listing or the ones contained in the pattern to sell your item you must take your own photos do not create a pattern based on my pattern copyright @ divine debris 2025 no part of this document may be reproduced or transmitted in any form by any means electronic mechanical photocopying or otherwise without prior written permission from the author sales of finished product are permitted but designer requests that you link back to pattern and credit divine debris with the original design under the creative commons attribution-share alike license if you have any questions comments or concerns please contact
